Detailed Description

Interface that provides generic methods for Database Tables

BDDTableInterface::Select (  $  fields,
$  options
)  [abstract]
 

Computes a selection of $fields on entries that correspond to $options

Parameters:
$fields array of string that reprensents fields' name to select
$options string that contains various select options like "where", "order", "limit", ...
Returns:
- a BDDRecordSet that contains BDDRecord-s ( Database entries) if select was successful

- an Errors object in case of error(s) : see BDDConnectionInterface::Query

Implemented in MySQLTable.

BDDTableInterface::Update (  BDDRecord $  updatedRec,
$  clause
)  [abstract]
 

Tries to update with the given $updatedRec into database in function of $clause parameter.

Parameters:
$updatedRec the BDDRecord updated
$clause clause constructed in Data Manipulation Language (eg. SQL) to determine which record has to be updated
Returns:
- see BDDConnectionInterface::Query

Implemented in MySQLTable.
